description:
Tree in Equity Mews are outside the CA and not protected - Tree number - T1
Tree type - Ash (Fraxinus excelsior)
Approx Height - 18m
Location - right hand side of clients driveway (neighbours tree)
Service - Prune
Work required- reduce back the side which overhangs the clients access road and driveways
back to the edge of the road and driveway by removing approximately 2-4m but pruning to
suitable growth points
Reason - as per clients wishes to minimise the amount of tree related debris falling on the cars below

Tree number - G1, G2 & T2
Tree type - various tree species
Approx Height - 4-6m
Location - Rear garden (some are neighbour's trees)
Service - Prune
Work required- prune back all the overhang to the clients garden from the neighbour's trees back to the boundary.
Remove X1 lowest branch on the cherry tree in the clients garden
Reason - as per clients wishes
